sections.text: Terms, defined.For purposes of the Municipality Infrastructure Aid Act:(1) Eligible grantee means a city of the first class, city of the second class, or village with a redevelopment plan approved under the Community Development Law;(2) Infrastructure includes water systems, sewer systems, roads, bridges, and other site development activities; and(3) Program means the Municipality Infrastructure Aid Program created in section 19-5703.SourceLaws 2024, LB600, ยง 2.Cross ReferencesCommunity Development Law, see section 18-2101.
